rules.naming: Name end with event type (Created, Updated, Deleted, etc.)
rules.properties: Include all relevant data for event consumers

example.template: namespace __NS__.__MOD_NAME__.IntegrationEvents; public record ExampleCreated(Guid Id, string Name, DateTime CreatedUtc);
example.usage: Publish in Application service: await _distributedEventBus.PublishAsync(new ExampleCreatedV1(entity.Id, entity.Name, DateTime.UtcNow));
